Html:
Hi all,
    I have got a cell with multi line (ctrl+enter) text.

When I read it with  $myTabs = $objPHPExcel->getSheetByName('MyTabs')->toArray(null,false,false,false); I only get the first line of the cell, not its entire content.

Any ideas ?

 

Thanks a lot!
Actually, it works fine with .gnumeric, .xls and .xslx but NOT with .ods !
